scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node ./plugins/script.env.js && echo "Info: the current env is dev" && exit 1
scripts.pro: cross-env NODE_ENV=pro node ./plugins/script.env.js && echo "Info: the current env is pro" && exit 1
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node ./plugins/script.env.js && echo "Info: the current env is test" && exit 1
scripts.view: cross-env NODE_ENV=view node ./plugins/script.env.js && echo "Info: the current env is view" && exit 1
